title: Ironbound beastmaster

|   | A cruel and wild brute who growls in the language of the untamed. It conditions beasts for combat with nets and malice, and spurs them to fight its foes. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful info](#Useful_info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful info

**Ironbound beastmasters** are enemies exclusive to the [Vaults](/Vaults "Vaults"). They spawn with packs of [dire elephants](/Dire_elephant "Dire elephant") or [lindwurms](/Lindwurm "Lindwurm"), able to speed them up with Goad Beasts.

## Spells

| Spell set |                                           |                                                      |
| :-------- | ----------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1     | [Goad Beasts](/Goad_Beasts "Goad Beasts") | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Goat Beats increases the "energy" of nearby animals, giving them a chance to move again.

## History

- Ironbound beastmasters were removed in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28").
- Ironbound beastmasters were added in [0.27](/0.27 "0.27").

Ironbound beastmaster

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
ironbound beastmaster p 
HP 36-74
HD 12
XP 835
Speed 10
AC 0
EV 14
Will 40
Attack1 30 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type human, human
Flags Speaks
Warm-blooded
Requires band
A cruel and wild brute who growls in the language of the untamed. It conditions beasts for combat with nets and malice, and spurs them to fight its foes.

Contents

  • 1 Useful info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful info

Ironbound beastmasters are enemies exclusive to the Vaults. They spawn with packs of dire elephants or lindwurms, able to speed them up with Goad Beasts.

Spells

Spell set
Slot1 Goad Beasts Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Goat Beats increases the "energy" of nearby animals, giving them a chance to move again.

History

  • Ironbound beastmasters were removed in 0.28.
  • Ironbound beastmasters were added in 0.27.
